LookForward.js

LookForward.js is a small library that helps you to create smooth transitions between pages with the easiest way

View on GitHub

Installation

via npm

$ npm install lookforward --save

or yarn

$ yarn add lookforward

Usage

new LookForward('.js-lookforward');
